rows.label: tev000692_MSG0001
rows.name: Hey there, [ST:playername ].[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000692_MSG0002
rows.name: Pretty rare for us to meet on the job like this, eh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000692_MSG0003
rows.name: We were just talking weapon maintenance.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000692_MSG0004
rows.name:
As an Interceptor, you never wanna go up against an
indigen with your weapon and armor in anything less
than flawless condition.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000692_JNK0010
rows.name: Approve

rows.label: tev000692_SEL0011
rows.name: Praise Frye for not charging in half-cocked.

rows.label: tev000692_JNK0020
rows.name: Tease

rows.label: tev000692_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Frye why he doesn't just use his fists.

rows.label: tev000692_MSG0005
rows.name:
You're damn right we don't charge in half-cocked.
We don't even charge in ALL-cocked! That's a good
way to get yourself eaten by some toothy critter.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000692_MSG0006
rows.name:
There ain't no way a human can overpower some of
these indigens. And if ya can't out-think 'em,
you got no shot at all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000692_MSG0007
rows.name: Hey, even I couldn't punch a millesaur to death.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000692_MSG0008
rows.name:
A cinicula, though? Or anything weaker than that?
Yeah, I could take 'em bare-handed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000692_MSG0009
rows.name:
Hey, lemme bend your ear for a bit, all right?
When I was just a lad, my dad saw me treating my
hunting rifle real rough and told me something.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000692_MSG0010
rows.name:
He said, "No matter how powerful your weapon,
if you let it break down, it's only an anchor."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000692_MSG0012
rows.name:
After that, I made it a point to take real good care
of all my gear.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000692_MSG0014
rows.name:
I even talk to mechanics, like this one, to make sure
everything's in perfect condition.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000692_MSG0013
rows.name: So then! What's your weapon look like these days?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000692_JNK0030
rows.name: Rough

rows.label: tev000692_SEL0031
rows.name: Admit that you're as bad as young Frye.

rows.label: tev000692_JNK0040
rows.name: Flawless

rows.label: tev000692_SEL0041
rows.name: Claim that you fastidiously maintain it yourself.

rows.label: tev000692_MSG0015
rows.name: Ah, hell. We were all young once.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000692_MSG0016
rows.name:
But looking at it from here, it doesn't seem like it's in
such bad shape.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000692_MSG0017
rows.name:
Maybe Elma or Lin maintain it for you while you're
sleeping?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000692_MSG0018
rows.name:
You oughta thank 'em for that.
They might have saved your damn life.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000692_MSG0019
rows.name:
Well, I still got a little touch-up work to do on this
baby at home. Catch ya later.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000692_MSG0020
rows.name: Right? You know the score.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000692_MSG0021
rows.name:
I'd noticed the pristine condition of your weapon,
but figured someone else had been helping you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000692_MSG0022
rows.name: Guess I misjudged you, [ST:playername ].[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000692_MSG0023
rows.name:
Well, I ain't gonna stand for someone else having
the best maintained weapon in BLADEâ€”I'm heading
home to do a little more touch-up work. Later.[ST:wait ]
